issue.title: [Rust] Fix undefined behaviour and and remove unsafe
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7813](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7813). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The rust implementation contains a lot more unsafe than is necessary and in many of these instances it is possible to invoke undefined behaviour from safe code.
